source.name: Embeddings
source.instructions: **Which of the following is true about embeddings?**

answers.answer: They are a type of machine learning model.
They are a way to represent text as a sequence of integers.
They are a type of vector representation of input data.
They are only used for text search and text similarity.

source.guidance: They are a type of vector representation of input data. They are often used in machine learning and natural language processing to convert categorical variables to continuous vectors. Embeddings essentially provide a way of reducing dimensionality and dealing with sparse data.
